name: THE ROAD GAME 1.0Alpha
description:
By: Eduardo Hernández Díaz Artist 3B Amerike CDMX
Lic. Creación Artística para Medios Digitales y Videojuegos.
Diseño de Videojuegos - Profesor: Gonzalo 'Phill' Sánchez
"The road game" is a runner game. Its aim is not to crash the car, but also to avoid running out of fuel. This is the prototype version, I'll add more mechanics :) Hey!, this is my first hyper casual game. I had never done something like this. It is made for a school project. but I found it very funny when I was making the video game. I will keep learning new things and will be adding new features to the game. I hope you like it. Keyboard controls:
  • Left Arrow 
  • Right Arrow 
Follow me on my Instagram @eduuhdiaz
